channel.title: niv on Equipped Youth Manual
channel.description: Recent content in niv on Equipped Youth Manual

item.title: 1 Timothy 1:15
item.description: Here is a trustworthy saying that deserves full acceptance: Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners—of whom I am the worst.

item.title: Ephesians 2:10
item.description: For we are God’s handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.

item.title: John 3:16
item.description: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.
